id.description: The unique identifier of this subject

title.description: The title (name) of a Attachment, if the title is left empty the file name wil be used instead

summary.description: A short summary of the subject for the overview page

description.description: An extensive description of the subject for display on the subject page

labels.description: Possible labels on the attachment that are used to assess what kind of file it is

url.description: The URL to the original document, this URL  should be accessible to Open Index. When there is an â€˜POST` or `PUT` request to Open Index then Open Index wil try to get the original file from the URL and use it to fill the `documentText`,` type`, ` extension` and ` size` properties

documentText.description: The text from the original document, which is included in the search index to facilitate searching of documents. This value is automatically updated and thus cannot be set via the API

type.description: The MIME type of the attachment, determined at the time of reading and recorded for display in the UI. This value is automatically updated and thus cannot be set via the API

extension.description: The extension of the attachment, determined at the time of reading and recorded for display in the UI. This value is automatically updated and thus cannot be set via the API

size.description: The size of the attachment in bytes, determined at the time of reading and recorded for display in the UI. This value is automatically updated and thus cannot be set via the API
